work.name: Commodities Migration
work.languages: Oracle SQL, Java 6, Shell scripting, Drools
work.description: A migration of commodity index trades from vendor product Endur to in house system Doman. This resulted in a savings of $2 million a year to the firm. Involved creating new tables, editing existing trade capture flows, creating new automated reports, and interacting directly with COO, sales, traders, and middle office.

personal.name: Habitat Tracker
personal.description: An application to track bird harvests for a hunting outfitter. Allows saving of data and querying over multiple fields. Includes the ability to save query results in Excel format.
